briefTitle: Prospective Cohort for Tumor Bed Boost Radiotherapy in HER2 Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Prospective Cohort for Tumor Bed Boost Radiotherapy in HER2 Positive Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patients with age minimum 19
* Pathological confirmation of HER2+ invasive breast cancer
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0-2
* Informed consent of the participant

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pathological confirmation of ductal carcinoma in situ of the breast
* Previous history of radiation therapy to ipsilateral breast
